title: Google\Cloud\Core\Iterator\PageIteratorTrait
name: PageIteratorTrait
description: This trait fulfills the \Iterator interface and returns results as a page of items.

params.name: config.itemsKey
params.description: The key for the items to iterate over from the response. Defaults to "items".

params.name: config.nextResultTokenKey
params.description: The key for the next result token in the response. Defaults to "nextPageToken".

params.name: config.resultTokenKey
params.description: The key for the results token set in the request. Defaults too "pageToken".

params.name: config.firstPage
params.description: The first page of results. If set, this data will be used for the first page of results instead of making a network request.

params.name: config.setNextResultTokenCondition
params.description: If this condition passes then it should be considered safe to set the token to get the next set of results.

params.name: config.resultLimit
params.description: Limit the number of results returned in total. Defaults to 0 (return all results).

methods.name: nextResultToken
methods.description: Fetch the token used to get the next set of results.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Determines if the current position is valid.
